places_with_reviews.name: SPOT ON 810649 The Ss Hotel
address: Plot No 10, 3rd Floor, Sunny Point Near Bus Stop, Bhadrawati, Gautam Nagar, Chandrapur, Bhadravati, Maharashtra 442902, India

reviews.text:
One of the worst hotels I have seen in my life. Rooms are so bad washroom used as a Butcher Shop. Owner is showing very rude behaviour and what rate you will see in the app has 8382 of 482 something it will not be same when you will visit the hotel. Owner will force you to pay 800 rupees but it's not worth that I am please requesting you guys if you are searching to this hotel better go to Sunny point it's below that only in 1st floor this is go to atal and clean rooms are clean washing .

Hotel doesn't deserve a single star but to give a feedback and given

reviews.text:
Ambience is good.
Food and service is also great.
Very bad waiters behavior and totally worst taste. I never appreciate you to visit here.
New restaurant on chandrapur Nagpur highway. Nice ambience, huge open space and tasty food with reasonable price. Go for it.

Worst and no any level of service , behavior and manners .
I suggest don't visit here .
Waiter service is not satisfied .After long  time we are tired .

places_with_reviews.name: Eco Lake View Resort
address: Near Junona Buffer, on MTDC road, Taluka Bhadrawati, 4427+4RP, Gaurala, Moharli, Bhadravati, Maharashtra 442701, India

reviews.text: This resort has lake view and in jungle it's hard get this ambience. Staff is very cooperative and rooms are also well mentained. Food quality is also up to the mark.
Though this resort was under construction when we went ,the service was good and the food was great. Rooms are very comfortable . Hope it will be completed till our next visiti
Resort is good in moharli Tadoba national park. Ambiance is good feel jungle stay, food quality is also good with well maintained staff. best place to stay in Tadoba national park .
Moharli gate in tadoba is very good . Resort is also good food and staff all is perfect. Ambience is also very nice. Specially lake view is perfect.
Nice and comfurtable resort. Rooms are clean and food quality is also very good. In jungle such nice food really superb.

preprocessed_reviews: resort lake view jungle hard get ambience staff cooperative rooms also well mentained food quality also mark
though resort construction went service good food great rooms comfortable hope completed till next visiti
resort good moharli tadoba national park ambiance good feel jungle stay food quality also good well maintained staff best place stay tadoba national park
moharli gate tadoba good resort also good food staff perfect ambience also nice specially lake view perfect
nice comfurtable resort rooms clean food quality also good jungle nice food really superb
